What is the deal with that? If I accept it, does that mean I need to park the guy in kerbin orbit, dock and bring him home? Or if I accept the mission, he is going to appear in Kerbin orbit and I can go scoop him up?

Really? I've never gotten it more than once at a time.. or does it respawn after you pick up but before you land?

Be warned, there is a bug (Not sure if it's mod related, as I have lots of them) where it will put a copy inside the command pod and leave him hanging on the ladder.

A workaround is to:

switch to the ship

EVA he rescued Kerbal,

Switch to the copy (the one that was hanging on the ladder)

Put him in the capsule (He will disappear, but not get added to the capsule)

reboard with the rescued Kerbal.

No idea, but so far I had to rescue Munmy and Bilvan from orbit lol

I use a probe with a empty capsule attached and just 2 stage it to him cost me about 20k to retrieve him, i also dock with my station and leave my extra fuel and RCS i do not use at the station. probably not as efficient but when i launch with the right timing I get within 5km and just fly him to me.
Thanks everyone (and sorry for taking so long to respond)!
